onTurnBasedMatchReceived(com.google.andr.Description: Callback invoked when a new update to a match arrives. Note that if a listener receives this callback, the system will not display a notification for this event.

Parameters: The ID of the match that has been removed.
onTurnBasedMatchRemoved(java.lang.String.Description: Callback invoked when a match has been removed from the local device. For example, this might occur if the player leaves the match on another device.

ClassDesc: Listener invoked when an update to a turn-based match is received.
